intro.title: Phone Repair Leuven | Hardware & Software Service for All Devices
intro.welcome: Welcome to 5G Phones, specialist in phone repair Leuven. Professional phone repair for iPhone, Samsung, Huawei, MacBook and all other brands. From screen replacement to Windows installation, password reset, virus removal - we solve all technical problems at Bondgenotenlaan 84A in Leuven.
intro.hardware: Hardware: ✓ iPhone, Samsung, Huawei, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Nokia & Google Pixel repair • ✓ MacBook & iMac service • ✓ Laptop & Desktop repair • ✓ iPad & Tablet service
intro.accessories: Accessories: ✓ iPhone/Samsung/iPad/Huawei/Xiaomi/OnePlus/Nokia/Google Pixel cases & covers • ✓ Screen protectors • ✓ Chargers & adapters • ✓ Headphones • ✓ Computer chargers • ✓ USB-C, Lightning & Micro-USB cables
intro.software: Software: ✓ Windows installation • ✓ Password reset • ✓ Virus removal • ✓ Data recovery • ✓ Software troubleshooting
intro.guarantee: 6 months warranty • Free diagnosis • Same-day service • Also serving customers from Wespelaar, Haacht, and surrounding areas

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions - Phone Repair Leuven
faq.subtitle: Have more questions about our repair services?

q1.question: Where can I get my phone repaired in Leuven?
q1.answer: 5G Phones is your trusted phone repair shop in Leuven, located at Bondgenotenlaan 84A. We offer professional smartphone repair for all brands: iPhone, Samsung, Huawei, Xiaomi and more. Customers from Wespelaar, Haacht, Rotselaar and surrounding areas are welcome!

q2.question: How much does an iPhone screen repair cost in Leuven?
q2.answer: The price for iPhone repair in Leuven varies by model. An iPhone screen replacement costs on average between €79 and €199, depending on the model. We offer transparent pricing, free diagnosis and 6 months warranty on all repairs. Request a free quote!

q3.question: How long does a smartphone repair take?
q3.answer: Most phone repairs in Leuven are completed within 1-2 hours. For screen replacements and battery changes, you can often pick up your device the same day. More complex repairs may take 24-48 hours. We always inform you in advance about the expected turnaround time.

q4.question: Which brands and devices do you repair in Leuven?
q4.answer: We repair all popular brands and devices: Apple (iPhone, iPad, MacBook, iMac), Samsung (Galaxy smartphones & tablets), Huawei, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Google Pixel, and all Windows laptops & desktops (HP, Dell, Lenovo, Asus, Acer). Also MacBook Pro/Air repair, iMac service, laptop screen replacement and computer troubleshooting are among our specialties in Leuven.

q5.question: Do you also do MacBook and laptop repair in Leuven?
q5.answer: Yes! MacBook repair and laptop service are a big part of our services. We replace MacBook screens, batteries, keyboards, solve software problems, and repair all Windows laptops. Also for desktop PC repair, iMac service and computer upgrades you've come to the right place. Fast diagnosis and fair prices guaranteed!

q6.question: Do you also repair iPads and tablets?
q6.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in iPad repair and tablet service in Leuven. From iPad screen replacement, battery change, charging port repair to software updates - we help you with all iPad models (Pro, Air, Mini). Also Samsung Galaxy Tabs, Huawei tablets and other Android tablets we repair professionally with 6 months warranty.

q7.question: Do you also sell accessories for all devices?
q7.answer: Yes! In addition to repairs, we offer a wide range of accessories for all devices: iPhone & Samsung cases, iPad cases, MacBook sleeves, laptop bags, screen protectors, chargers, USB-C cables, power banks, wireless earbuds, mouse & keyboards, and more. Also parts for DIY repair are available. Everything in stock in Leuven!

q8.question: Can you install Windows on my laptop?
q8.answer: Yes! We offer complete Windows installation service in Leuven for all laptops and desktops. From Windows 10/11 reinstallation, OS upgrade, driver installation to full system configuration - we make sure your computer works optimally again. Also macOS installation on MacBooks and software updates for all systems are among our services. Includes data backup!

q9.question: I forgot my password, can you help?
q9.answer: Absolutely! We offer password reset service for all devices: iPhone password reset, Samsung unlock, Windows password recovery, MacBook password reset and more. Also for forgotten iCloud accounts, Google account problems and BitLocker recovery we can help you. Our technicians have specialized tools to keep your data safe while we restore access.

q10.question: My computer is slow or has viruses, what can you do?
q10.answer: We specialize in virus removal, malware removal and computer troubleshooting for all systems. Symptoms like slow laptop, crashes, pop-ups, stolen data we solve quickly. Our service includes: full virus scan, malware removal, system optimization, data recovery and preventive protection installation. Also for iPhone software problems, Samsung glitches and MacBook issues we're ready. Same-day service available!

q11.question: Do you give warranty on repairs?
q11.answer: Absolutely! All phone repairs at 5G Phones come with 6 months warranty. We only use high-quality parts and our experienced technicians ensure professional service. If a problem occurs with the repair within the warranty period, we fix it free of charge.

hero.title: About 5gphones Leuven
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for device repairs and premium accessories since 2019

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: 5gphones was founded in 2019 with a simple mission: to provide reliable, affordable device repair services to our community. What started as a small repair shop has grown into a trusted local business serving thousands of customers.
story.paragraph2: We noticed that many people were frustrated with expensive repair quotes, long wait times, and poor customer service from other providers. That's when we decided to create a different kind of repair shop - one that puts customers first and delivers exceptional service at fair prices.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to be the go-to repair destination for smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more. Our team of certified technicians has the expertise to handle everything from simple screen replacements to complex logic board repairs.

timeline.2019: Founded 5gphones with a vision to revolutionize device repair services
timeline.2021: Expanded to our current location and added premium accessories
timeline.2024: Achieved 10,000+ successful repairs and 4.9/5 customer rating
